name: Walk With Dog
description:
funny game where you can have a morning walk with your Dog, run and save yourself from the obstacles .
A game full of funs and skills! ! !
It is not only the simple jumping. There are many traps and natural enemies! The journey of the little girl is very exciting! ! !
This game is very interesting. You will control the dog to run and jump! You may jump up to another planet!
Features
Perfect combination of puzzle and game entertainment
Gorgeous visual effects and smooth game control
Vivid background musica
Numerous power-ups give you more fun!
